mapper.select: SELECT report_id AS reportId,user_id AS userId,task_id AS taskId,check_id AS checkId,supervisor_id AS supervisorId,essay_id AS essayId,report_time AS reportTime,report_content AS reportContent,report_type AS reportType,process_result AS processResult,process_time AS processTime, user_reported_id AS userReportedId FROM report WHERE user_id IN (select user_id from user where user_name LIKE "%"#{username}"%") ORDER BY report_time
